price: そしてあなたの主*の、高貴さと荘厳さを湛えた御顔だけが残る。
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
